text:
I dont know if this is a bug because i have to admit that I am a noob to 
subjects related to servers networks e.t.c.
 
I have created the following file to pass the value of the text field to the 
result.php file (it is shown below) but the form does not submit any data to 
the php file... Please note that php is working fine(i have tested some 
querries to mysql db). If you believe that the subject is too stupid don't 
bother to answer (I am a noob I know). I am just desperate because i created a 
small search engine and now i will have to use ms access instead...

Thank you for your time...
